Film Locations Archive

Read
Location Westminster Underground Station

Westminster station is located in central London, on the north bank of the Thames River.

Location The Hogwarts Express Train

The Hogwarts Express is a real train.

Location Thames River

The Thames River is the second largest river in the UK and the longest river in the England.

Location St Paul's Cathedral

St Paul's Cathedral is an Anglican cathedral in London.

Location St Pancras Station

St Pancras Railway Station is a large railway station located in the St Pancras area of London.

Location Piccadilly Circus

Piccadilly Circus is London's premier shopping district.

Location London Zoo

London Zoo is the world's oldest scientific zoo. It was opened to the public in 1847.

Location Leadenhall Market

Leadenhall Market is a covered market in London, located on Gracechurch Street.

Location Lambeth Bridge

Lambeth Bridge spans the River Thames and connects Lambeth to Westminster.

Location King's Cross Station

King's Cross railway station, also known as London King's Cross.

Location Hogwarts Stairs

The very well-known Harry Potter filming location is the stairwell leading to the hall.

Location Great Scotland Yard

Great Scotland Yard is a street in Westminster, London.

Location Christian Church Canteen

Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry has a magnificent and solemn restaurant with a dome full of stars.

Location Borough Market

Borough Market is London's famous food market.

Location Australia House

Australia House, is the diplomatic arm of Australia in the United Kingdom.

Location Alnwick Castle

Alnwick Castle is a castle and country house in Alnwick in the English county of Northumberland.
